snippet.title: Golden Sun 64 - Release and Download
snippet.description:
Take on the island of Neo-Angara and King Bob-Omb in this new RPG-platformer hybrid mini-hack.
Thumbnail (and other game) artwork provided by SPK (https://twitter.com/spktktv)
Download: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1unLPMyEmW_jeGHhVKPiaQnP81mjy1zgM/view?usp=sharing

FAQ:
Q: My ROM crashes on boot. I'm using Project 64 2.3.x.
A: Don't use this emulator, it's generally incompatible with many games. Use the better Project 64 2.4 instead (https://www.pj64-emu.com/nightly-builds)
Q: I'm trying to play this on mobile, but I can't find an option to change the save type.
A: As far as I'm aware, no mobile N64 emulator supports changing save types, rendering this game unplayable on there. If I'm incorrect about this, please let me know.

If you have any questions about the hack, leave them in the comments and I'll add them here!

I stream SM64 hack making, and other things too!: https://www.twitch.tv/cheezepin
I have a discord server!: https://discord.gg/hbteQN8

#GoldenSun #Mario #Cheezepin
